messageBody:
ovisual12 wrote:
>
>
> Hi,
>
> My name is Vince and I am looking for a reliable solution to testing
> EJB's. I have came
> across various tools including XJB, EJBUnit, Embedded Jboss, Cactus,
> etc.. I am just
> wondering which solution is the most mature and most supported by the
> community. I need
> to be able to mock up JNDI so that I can test the persistance in my
> EJB's.

I've used MockEJB for that. Its MockContext worked well.

> I would like to test
> outside the container as I hear this is the best method for testing
> EJBs. Can anyone give me
> some suggestions and point me in the right direction. Any help would be
> greatly appreciate,
> a tutorial anything that will help get me started. I would preferable
> like a solution that can fit
> into a night build and test enviornment. We use Continuum to build and
> test our companies
> code everynight. If I could drive the EJB test cases from a Maven pom
> that would be a bonus.

It's getting older, but the suggestions in _JUnit Recipes_ have yet to
be replaced with better advice, at least in print.

Take care.
